Ability: Desert Arrow's damage increases to 120% of DPS

Ability: On Dark Smash's hit, decreases Dark type resistance by 20% for 3 second(s), and generates a shield by 10% of the inflicted damage upon enemies.

Ability: The number of Flame Explosion increases one extra time and an explosion occurs, inflicting extra damage with 30% chance on Flame Blow's hit.

Ability: When attacking, throws enhanced Fox Bead by 40% chance.

Ability: When attacking, fires a special grenade that inflicts extra 50% of DPS damage once in 3 seconds.

Ability: Fires a swift spell bullet by 50% chance. Swift spell bullet shoots at 40% higher speed, and it recharges in 40% shorter time than normal spell bullets.

Name: Future Princess
Ability: On hit, inflicts 30% of DPS by 30% chance, restores all Party members' HP by 2%

Name: Knight Lady Lapice
Ability: Increases the attack range of Thousand Needles. She can also jump start Thousand Needles from level 3 right after using skills.

Name: Mecha Warrior Oghma
Ability: Returns part of inflicted damages to the attacker in proportion to Oghma's Def. 1 second(s) cooltime.

Name: Movie Star Eugene

Ability: When hit by melee attacks, inflicts 20% of DPS damage to the attacker and restores 1% HP. The damage increases in proportion to the Def. 2 second(s) cooltime.

Ability: When hit by enemies, your rage explodes with 20% chance and inflicts 50% of DPS damage to enemies. 1 second(s) cooltime.

Name: Pirate Rachel

Name: Princess Aisha
